title: Caught
description: THIS IS THE OLD EDITION OF THE BOOK. FOR THE RE-RELEASED EDITION PLEASE SEE https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/2...When Callie returns to her hometown for the holidays, she comes face to face with her old lover and Dominant Jack. Jack still wants her, and she finds herself wanting to submit to him from the first time Jack touches her. But as he draws her deeper and deeper into his world once again, will she lose her heart too?
author: Cassandra Carr
